```{r, include=FALSE}
runkml3d<-function(data, variable.loc, time=c(1,2,3),newvar='cluster'){
  set.seed(123456)
  cld <- cld3d(data,timeInData=variable.loc,time=time)
  kml3d(cld,nbClusters=4:7,nbRedrawing=20)
#  try(choice(cld))
  a=plotAllCriterion(cld,CRITERION_NAMES[4])
  return(cld)
}

```

#### For exposure definition, d0s0 - did not smoke or drink, d0s1 - did not drink, but did smoke, etc
```{r, echo=FALSE, warning = FALSE, message = FALSE}
## Subset data
pass.SA.completers = merge[merge$site=='BISH' & merge$TotCigs_Num_Avai_tri==3 & merge$TotalStdDrinks_Num_Avai_tri==3,]

# Merge the drinking and smoking variables
drinkvars=names(merge)[grep('TotalStdDrinksT',names(merge))]
cigvars=names(merge)[grep('TotCigsT',names(merge))]

# Run Kml3d for joint clusters
cld.joint <- cld3d(pass.SA.completers[pass.SA.completers$total_exposure_both!='d0s0',], timeInData = list(grep('TotCigsT',names(merge)),grep('TotalStdDrinksT',names(merge))), time = c(1,2,3))
kml3d(cld.joint,nbClusters = 4:9)

# Create new column called 'Cluster.TotalStdDrinks' with all NA entries
pass.SA.completers$Cluster.TotalJoint<-NA

# Enter 'N' in the 'Cluster.TotalStdDrinks' column for all nonexposed patients
pass.SA.completers$Cluster.TotalJoint[pass.SA.completers$total_exposure_both=='d0s0']='N'

# Input cluster number for each patient into the 'Cluster.TotalStdDrinks' column
pass.SA.completers$Cluster.TotalJoint[pass.SA.completers$total_exposure_both!='d0s0']=getClusters(cld.joint,4)

# Sample size tables
library(matrixStats)
library(kableExtra)

StdJoint.count <- table(pass.SA.completers$Cluster.TotalJoint)
StdJoint.Prop <- round(prop.table(StdJoint.count)*100, digits = 1)
StdJoint.Cum <- round((cumsum(StdJoint.count)/(dim(pass.SA.completers)[1]))*100, digits = 1)
StdJoint.Table <- data.frame(cbind(StdJoint.count,StdJoint.Prop, StdJoint.Cum))
binded <- rbind(StdJoint.Table,"Sum" = colSums(StdJoint.Table[1:2]))
binded[6,3] <- ""

Joint.count.kable <- kable(binded, col.names = c("N","Raw %","Cumulative %"), "html", caption = "Subject Count Per Cluster")
kable_styling(Joint.count.kable, bootstrap_options = c("striped", "hover"), full_width = F, position = "left")

CrossTab.Joint <- addmargins(xtabs(~Cluster.TotalJoint+total_exposure_both, data = pass.SA.completers))

Joint.prop.kable <- kable(CrossTab.Joint, "html", caption = "Subject Count Grouped by Cluster and Exposure")
kable_styling(Joint.prop.kable, bootstrap_options = c("striped", "hover"), full_width = F, position = "left")


ggplot(melt(pass.SA.completers[,c("patid","Cluster.TotalJoint", cigvars)], id=c('patid','Cluster.TotalJoint')), aes(x=variable,y=value, group=patid, colour=Cluster.TotalJoint))+ggtitle("Total Cigarettes for Joint Cluster")+stat_summary(aes(y = value,group = Cluster.TotalJoint), fun.y=mean, geom="line",size=2) + scale_x_discrete(labels=c("T1","T2","T3")) + facet_grid(. ~ Cluster.TotalJoint)


ggplot(melt(pass.SA.completers[,c("patid","Cluster.TotalJoint", drinkvars)], id=c('patid','Cluster.TotalJoint')), aes(x=variable,y=value, group=patid, colour=Cluster.TotalJoint))+ggtitle("Total Standard Drinks for Joint Cluster")+stat_summary(aes(y = value,group = Cluster.TotalJoint), fun.y=mean, geom="line",size=2) + scale_x_discrete(labels=c("T1","T2","T3")) + facet_grid(. ~ Cluster.TotalJoint)


```
